text: Geir Aksel Røse (born 19 April 1948) is a retired Norwegian handball player who competed in the 1972 Summer Olympics. He was born in Oslo and represented the club Oppsal IF. In 1972 he was part of the Norwegian team which finished ninth in the Olympic tournament. He played three matches and scored one goal. ==References== Category:1948 births Category:Living people Category:Norwegian male handball players Category:Olympic handball players of Norway Category:Handball players at the 1972 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Oslo
title: Geir Røse
